programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton comes to the aid of self-confessed `history buffs' Elaine and Patrick Scott, who hope to make a permanent move to the Manche region of Normandy, in northern France.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi helps Claire Streets and Jon Jevons find a new home in the Andalusia region of Spain. With a budget of £150,000, the Nottinghamshire couple hope to find a property with enough land for them to set up a luxury camping business.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Avon Dixon and Giovanna Piscopo from Leicestershire are looking for a holiday home in the Dordogne region of France that will serve as a summer getaway until they can retire there in a few years' time. Ben Hillman shows them what their £100,000 will buy them in this stunning rural corner of the country.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: John and Della Baines ask Jasmine Harman to help them find the perfect holiday home on Cyprus. With a budget of £45,000, she shows them five apartments around the town of Paphos.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay uses his wealth of experience in the restaurant business to help struggling hotels, motels and B&Bs across America. After identifying the most pressing issues at each location, he puts the owners and staff to work as he attempts to save their establishments from disaster. His first stop is Coeur d'Alene, Idaho, where the Roosevelt Inn is more than $1million in debt - and to make matters worse, the owner's wife has had enough.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Part two of two. The chef continues his quest to transform the fortunes of the Burger Kitchen in Los Angeles, where tensions were running high because owner Alan Saffron had spent his son's entire inheritance on the struggling restaurant. Alan gets a wake-up call from internet critics, who he believes are trying to shut him down.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: First of a two-part special in which Gordon Ramsay heads to the Burger Kitchen in Los Angeles, where tensions are running high because owner Alan Saffron has spent his son's entire inheritance on the struggling restaurant. To make matters worse, the kitchen is run by a chef called David Blaine who shares nothing of his famous namesake's magic when it comes to cooking - and whose threatening behaviour regularly gets him into trouble.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman and Jonnie Irwin offer advice to Alix Sinclare, who cannot decide whether to start a new life in Teignmouth in Devon or Nerja on Spain's Costa del Sol.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton shows Juliette and Jonathan Cottam three homes in the Dordogne region of France, while Jasmine Harman tries to tempt them with three properties in Devon.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi helps Richard and Janie Wood search for a new property in the Almeria region of Spain on a budget of £80,000. Richard suffers from ill health and believes his pain could be alleviated by a move to warmer climes.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin searches Lot-et-Garonne in the south west of France for Karen Wright and Philip Johnston, who dream of retiring to the country. They have £100,000, but that isn't just for them. The property needs to be large enough for their five dogs - and to accommodate even more as they have a dream of fostering rescue pooches.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Female Sumatran tiger Kirana faces losing her two sons, who are fully grown and being moved to other zoos to start families of their own. Indonesian dwarf buffalo Oana, one of Chester's most sensitive animals, gives birth - only for the new mum's anxiety to threaten her calf's health. Capuchin monkey Maud's eldest son Rocky is causing problems, refusing to listen to his mother's life lessons, and capybara Lochley has to rely on her mum Lilly to look after her newborn babies when she falls ill.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A champion running dog is admitted to see if Noel and the team can fix its abnormal elbow joint, and a couple have a nerve-racking wait while their Rhodesian ridgeback undergoes a high-risk operation to relieve the pressure on the nerves in its spine. Noel also treats an injured dog belonging to a friend from the gym.(n)

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Cameras follow Louise, a 45-year-old mother-to-be and her estranged partner Dan, who helps her through labour. Meanwhile, Jess, 16, has always wanted a sibling, and gets more than she bargained for when her mum Elaine goes into labour at Liverpool Women's Hospital.(n)

programme.title: Confessions of a Junior Doctor
programme.desc: This episode follows junior doctors working at Northampton General A&E, as unprecedented numbers of patients put the doctors under increasing amounts of pressure. Having only been out of medical school for a year, Morgan is overwhelmed with nerves for her first stint in the A&E department, while junior doctor Dan has a different concern, and worries about dealing with grieving relatives in difficult situations.(n)

programme.title: Obsessive Compulsive Cleaners
programme.desc: British cleaners Hayley and Kris visit a retired academic, Professor Widdecombe in Vermont, USA, who hasn't properly cleaned his nine-bedroom historic property for a decade. The home is covered in cobwebs and cat hair, and each room is over-stuffed with possessions.(n)

programme.title: My Online Nightmare
programme.desc: This episode examines remarkable tales of cyberstalking and online threats, including the story of a news anchor left terrified after receiving anonymous text messages, which escalated to identity theft and murder threats. Elsewhere, a new couple received abusive messages from a mysterious woman on Facebook, who turned out to be an ex-partner seeking revenge.(n)

programme.title: Single Mums Club
programme.desc: Cameras follow a Liverpool community of single mums who are sticking together through thick and thin. Inbetween bringing up her twin sons and working full time, Sarah, 26, is studying for a university degree in the hope of owning her own house. Also featured is Mel, 32, who has four kids with two different dads, and Carmen, 37, who is trying to turn her life around after recovering from cocaine and alcohol addiction.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, including Bigheads, Britain's Got Talent, Line of Duty, Little Boy Blue, Joanna Lumley's Postcards, The Island with Bear Grylls and the News.(n)

programme.title: Big House, Little House
programme.desc: New series. Interior designer Aidan Keane helps two couples with two very different budgets create amazing new spaces in their homes, beginning with two open-plan kitchen-diners.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contest begins at the Black Lion in Halland, East Sussex, where host Nigel Fright gets off to a shaky start when a kettle goes missing from one of the rooms. Later, he takes the guests to a salsa class, where Sherrill Tacy and Hayley Cotton are surprised by some of his dance moves.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location

Phil Spencer helps local couple Sammi and Tom locate their perfect property on a budget of £180,000 in a specific three-mile radius north of Leeds.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp meets thrill-seeker Davy, who likes snowboarding and skateboarding, and wants a property in west London, while Phil Spencer is in the north of the city helping Rajeev and Nisha find their dream family home after renting for five years. However, despite a generous £500,000 budget, the couple discover they can't have everything they want.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Estate agent Adam Reed hosts the first party in Southend-on-Sea, Essex, confident his eclectic menu incorporating dishes from three continents, as well as plans to round off the evening Mexican-style with a shot of tequila, will be a success. His fellow diners are ageing hippie Andie Todd, ladies' man Scott Cooper, outspoken hairdresser Colin Vidgeon and lively former policewoman Kerry Tolliday.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Andie Todd hosts the second party in Southend-on-Sea, Essex, providing a menu of 1970s-inspired food. However, her starter of chicken-liver pate fails to live up to expectations, and reduces her chances of claiming the £1,000 prize on offer.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Colin Vidgeon hosts the third dinner-party challenge in Southend-on-Sea. He hopes to impress his guests with a menu of toad in the hole and garlic-baked prawns, but cooking blunders and makeshift decorations seriously hamper his chances.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Former policewoman Kerry Tolliday hosts the penultimate dinner party in Southend-on-Sea and provides a menu that places the emphasis on flavours. She also hires a psychic medium for the entertainment, but encounters scepticism from her guests during a ghost hunt.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Butcher Scott Cooper throws the final dinner party in Southend-on-Sea, Essex, and hopes to impress with a menu featuring duck, pork belly and black pudding. However, the evening turns sour when Andie Todd confronts the host about his sexist behaviour and crude jokes, before the winner of the £1,000 prize is announced.(n)

programme.title: The Restoration Man
programme.desc: Architect George Clarke returns to catch up with London couple Justin Hooper and Charlotte Seddon, who first appeared in the show's third series, planning to transform a derelict wartime airfield control tower in Scotland into a new family home. Four years later, George finds out how the pair's ambitious venture fared, as they struggled to project-manage the site from 600 miles away. With costs spiralling out of control, Justin and Charlotte faced a difficult decision: shut down the build, or make a complete lifestyle change by relocating their family to the site.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location

programme.title: How to Live Mortgage Free with Sarah Beeny

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The agents chase almost £3,000 owed by Indian takeaway owners, but when the staff deny any knowledge of the debt, the agents threaten to seize kitchen equipment. In east London they face a race against time to recover more than £8,000 from an electrical services company, and in Cheshire the enforcement agents chase nearly £4,000 of debt owed by a mobile phone shop.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Paul and Ben face a challenging eviction in London, where a vulnerable tenant in rent arrears has barricaded her front door, and the agents receive a tirade of abuse. Meanwhile, Brian and Del chase a debt of nearly £2,000 in Surrey, before trying to recover almost £3,000 in Northamptonshire. Finally, Steve and Ru head to Portsmouth to evict a young family for a landlord who wants her property back.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Stewart and Elmor attempt to collect £5,000 owed by a debtor in north Wales, but the situation spirals out of control when a group of friends try to take on the agents. Meanwhile, Del and Dael head to south-east London to chase nearly £7,000 owed by a man to his ex-girlfriend, before visiting a woman who owes her solicitor almost £4,000 after a compensation claim went wrong. In Manchester, Stewart and Vic face a hostile reception at a family-run garage that owes £6,000 in professional fees.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In south London, Del and Dael Anglin receive a hostile reception from the brother of a debtor who has alreasy defaulted on a promise to pay £2,000 she owes to a storage company. In Worcestershire, Gareth and Craig try to recover £45,000 from a young online entrepreneur, who claims no responsibility for the debt he owes to his courier. Their target cooks up a flimsy lie in an effort to absolve himself, but dishonesty proves to be the least of the agents' worries when they discover a stash of guns at the back of the garage. In east London, an Indian restaurant owner begins to take his financial responsibilities seriously when Del and Dael start removing cookers and freezers from his premises, and a pair of pensioners in Oxfordshire hope the High Court will provide them a lifeline as they try to pay off a £4,000 bill to a solicitors' firm after a failed compensation claim.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In this special episode, the High Court enforcement agents have to deal with a fraudulent tenant, an evasive debtor and a mother in denial. Steve and Ben are in west London to see a tenant who owes £14,000 in unpaid rent, but when they gain access to the property they discover the house has divided up like a hotel and is being sublet. In Sussex, Brian and Del chase a debt of over £10,000 owed to a van rental business for damaged vehicles, before heading to Kent to try to reclaim £6,000 of unpaid rent from a woman financially dependent on a new partner after a disastrous divorce.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.sub-title: Can't Pay Special: Big Family Bust Up.
programme.desc: One-off edition in which the High Court enforcement agents are caught in the crossfire of three bitter family disputes, including a debt-dodging man who pushes his panic-stricken mother over the edge. Plus, a family booted onto the streets at night by a ruthless aunt, and a man who won't engage with the agents and loses his car.(n)

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Sherry goes into labour and asks Rory to stay with her, prompting Lorelai to reminisce about her own daughter's birth and her teenage romance with Christopher. Elsewhere, Luke and Nicole's first date goes well, while Paris steps up her hate campaign.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary series giving an insight into the world of debt collection from the perspectives of debtors, creditors and those who collect the payments. Brian and Graham have been warned to expect trouble as they evict some tenants from a south London flat, one of whom has a reputation for violence. Everything goes smoothly until the enforcement agents make a shocking discovery in a child's bedroom. Paul and Steve head to Slough to collect wages owed to a freelance worker, but the debtor is less than happy to find the high-court enforcement officers on his doorstep and things get physical.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away

Meanwhile, Brian and Del chase £3,000 owed to a firm of letting agents, before tracking a debtor who was accidentally over-paid for a job. Plus, Stewart and Iain face an eviction that is set to test their patience.(n)

Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz.(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: In Joel Schumacher's taut thriller, told in real time, cynical, smarmy PR man Stu Shepard picks up a ringing phone in a booth in a busy New York street to find a killer on the line. Armed with a high-powered sniper's rifle, the anonymous caller soon proves his prowess and presents Shepard with a choice: convince the police of his story before they shoot him or drop the phone and be shot. His only hope lies in self-abasement and facing up to the truths of his life(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Young wizard-in-training Harry Potter (Daniel Radcliffe) returns to Hogwarts for his fifth year of studies, only to find that the magical community seems to be in a curious state of denial about his recent encounter with the sinister Lord Voldemort (Ralph Fiennes) in the fifth installment of the popular fantasy film series based on the best-selling books by author J.K. Rowling. Rumor has it that the dreaded Lord Voldemort has returned, but Minister for Magic Cornelius Fudge (Robert Hardy) isn't so sure what to make of all the hearsay currently floating around the campus of Hogwarts. Suspecting that Headmaster Albus Dumbledore (Michael Gambon) may be fueling the rumors regarding Voldemort's return in order to undermine his authority and lay claim to his job, Fudge entrusts newly arrived Defense Against the Dark Arts professor Dolores Umbridge (Imelda Staunton) with the task of tracking Dumbledore and keeping a protective watch over the nervous student body. The young wizards of Hogwarts will need something much more effective than Umbridge's Ministry-approved course in defensive magic if they are to truly succeed in the extraordinary battle that lies ahead, however, and when the administration fails to provide the students with the tools that they will need to defend Hogwarts against the fearsome powers of the Dark Arts, Hermione (Emma Watson), Ron (Rupert Grint), and Harry take it upon themselves to recruit a small group of students to form "Dumbledore's Army" in preparation for the ultimate supernatural showdown(n)

programme.title: On Deadly Ground
programme.desc: You don't mess with Steven Seagal, but when ruthless oil baron Michael Caine pumps oil into his beloved Alaskan waters and then tries to kill him, Seagal vows to take him and his organisation down(n)

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Upon release from jail, a con adopts his dead ex-cellmate's identity just to meet the man's girlfriend - but the girl's brother had plans to use the dead con's expert knowledge in a casino robbery, and the imposter is forced to take part. Also known as Reindeer Games(n)

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Director Ridley Scott spins this yarn concerning a Harlem drug kingpin (Denzel Washington) who smuggles heroin into the country by hiding it in the bodies of U.S. soldiers killed during battle in Vietnam. As honest NYPD detective Ritchie Roberts (Russell Crowe) investigates the case, his integrity is compromised by the meddling of the crooked Detective Trupo (Josh Brolin)(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: During a family camping trip at the Grand Canyon, a young boy stumbles upon an ancient Native American burial ground. He takes five sacred stones from there back to his suburban home, unaware that they contain a malevolent supernatural force(n)

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: A young girl is possessed by the devil and people begin to die. Her mother realises that her daughter's only possible hope lies with two priests and the ancient rite of demonic exorcism(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk
programme.desc: Doses of radiation turn a mild-mannered scientist into an angry, uncontrollable monstrosity in this adaptation of the Marvel Comics series. Lou Ferrigno, who played the Hulk in the 1970s TV series, has a cameo as a security guard and provides the voice of the Hulk(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Epic romantic adventure, set just prior to World War II, about an English aristocrat and the rugged drover who helps her with the cattle station she inherited(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: The Transporter star Jason Statham takes the wheel in director Paul W.S. Anderson's remake of the Roger Corman classic about a hyper-violent cross-country race that breaks all of the traditional rules of the road. The time is the not-so-distant future, and as America's prisons begin overflowing with violent criminals, the powers that be devise a grisly game that will free up space in the cells and entertain the masses at the same time. Jensen Ames (Statham) is a three-time speedway champion with a dark past. A survival expert and ex-con whose sordid history comes back to haunt him when he is framed for a murder he didn't commit, Ames is forced to choose between donning the metallic mask of a mythical racer known as Frankenstein or languishing away on Terminal Island -- America's most notorious penitentiary. Over the course of the next three days, this unlikely champion will get behind the wheel of a nightmare machine outfitted with machine guns, grenade launchers, and flamethrowers in a desperate attempt to outrun some of the most violent criminals ever imprisoned. Should Ames be the first to cross the checkered flag, he will win his freedom; should he come in second, however, death would be preferable to a grim future in a cramped concrete cell. Co-stars include Joan Allen, Ian McShane, Natalie Martinez, and Tyrese Gibson, who takes over the role of Machine Gun Joe, made famous by Sylvester Stallone in the original(n)

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: Detective thriller. When a brilliant forensics expert is paralysed in an accident, he is left confined to his bed and suicidal. But his help is needed with a sadistic serial killer on the loose in Manhattan. A young, female rookie detective becomes his 'eyes' on the streets in a race against time to catch the guilty man(n)

programme.title: Village of the Damned
programme.desc: Horror in which two doctors struggle to save the residents of a sleepy Californian village after a band of aliens impregnate ten female villagers in the hope of using their supernatural powers to reign supreme. Based on John Wyndham's novel The Midwich Cuckoos, this is a remake of an earlier 1960s film adaptation(n)

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: After losing faith in Christmas and tearing apart his letter to Santa, a young boy accidentally summons the malevolent holiday demon Krampus and his minions. The fearsome creatures proceed to wreak havoc on him and his dysfunctional family(n)

programme.title: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: Mad Max, now a loner, is reluctantly helping a tiny oil-producing community defend itself against band of depraved crazies thirsty for precious fuel(n)

programme.title: Coyote Ugly
programme.desc: Romantic comedy in which a shy songwriter moves to New York and finds love and the stardom she is seeking while working in the wild nightspot Coyote Ugly. As she attempts to get her music career off the ground, she works as a bartender, but the raucous behaviour of her colleagues - who dance on the counter while flirting outrageously with the clientele and downing copious amounts of alcohol - soon puts her relationship at risk(n)

programme.title: Welcome to Mooseport
programme.desc: Hollywood filmmaker Donald Petrie directs the comedy Welcome to Mooseport. Gene Hackman stars as former U.S. President Monroe "The Eagle" Cole. He's retired to the small New England town of Mooseport, ME, in order to write his memoirs and relax. The retirement is put on hold, however, when he's persuaded to run for mayor of the town. Meanwhile, local hardware store owner and plumber Handy Harrison (Ray Romano) is just the sort of plaid-shirted everyman to run against him. Cole seems a sure win in the race, especially with his loyal personal assistants (Marcia Gay Harden and Fred Savage) aiding his every move. The competition gets even more severe when Handy's sweetheart Sally (Maura Tierney) comes between the two men. Welcome to Mooseport also stars Christine Baranski and Rip Torn(n)

programme.title: Say Anything...
programme.desc: A beautiful and brilliant high school student finds herself pursued romantically by a charming but totally unambitious fellow student(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: A cocky marketing student works in a bar to get by, but falls under the tutelage of an older barman, who encourages him to live a selfish, hedonistic lifestyle(n)

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: PT Anderson assembles a remarkable cast for this striking drama that follows the broken lives of several LA residents(n)

programme.title: The Conspirator
programme.desc: When Abraham Lincoln is assassinated, Union war hero Frederick Aiken is brought in to defend alleged Confederate conspirator, Mary Surrat(n)

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A martial arts master uses a tournament to infiltrate the island fortress of a one-armed drug baron. Action(n)

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: Following a brutal bank robbery, the bank owner and his clients became FBI's prime suspects. However, further investigations into the series of heists uncover a deeper conspiracy(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Life long Treasure Hunter, Benjamin Franklin Gates (Nicolas Cage) finally finds the clue to America's greatest national treasure. In this race against time action thriller Gates must elude the authorities and unlock the 2000-year old mystery(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Catch a Contractor
programme.desc: Adam Carolla pursues a contractor who betrayed a friend. When a couple adopted four children, they decided their kitchen needed extending to accommodate their larger family, and turned to a builder whom they knew from school. However, he did not complete the work, taking the family's money and appliances.(n)

programme.title: The Reckoning
programme.desc: Having left behind the Amish life of her youth for the modern world, a woman must now come to terms with her heritage and the man she once loved. Romantic drama, starring Katie Leclerc, Chad Connell and Jacob Blair.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The teenage daughter of a notorious drug baron is found dead in a back street. Evidence suggests she had recently visited a local night club, causing Greg and Riley to suspect the involvement of its owner. However, evidence from the post-mortem forces the team to question the girl's involvement with one of her father's underlings.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Grissom and Riley investigate a double fatality at a street party in Las Vegas's Korean district. Evidence links the victims to a criminal organisation known for its connections to the vice industry. However, a discovery at the crime scene sheds new light on the case, and sets the team off in search of a youngster who may be the killer's next target. Starring William Petersen and Lauren Lee Smith.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Murder by the Book
programme.desc: An author of mystery novels kills his former writing partner so he can claim sole credit for their collaborations, and tries to appear innocent by offering to help Columbo solve the crime. Detective drama, directed by Steven Spielberg, starring Peter Falk, Jack Cassidy, Rosemary Forsyth and Barbara Colby.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Murder Under Glass
programme.desc: The crumpled detective applies his well-honed instincts to a case of blackmail and murder in the world of haute cuisine when a restaurant owner is found dead after throwing a renowned food critic off his premises. Crime drama from The Silence of the Lambs director Jonathan Demme, starring Peter Falk, Louis Jourdan, Shera Danese and Richard Dysart.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Death Lends a Hand
programme.desc: The crumpled cop investigates when a private eye murders his client's adulterous wife because she refuses to submit to his blackmail threats, and arranges the crime scene to make it look as if she was the victim of a mugging gone wrong. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, Ray Milland and Robert Culp.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A Navy lieutenant on shore leave stumbles from a busy bar and runs headlong into the path of an oncoming taxi, sustaining fatal injuries. Dr Loretta Wade quickly concludes that there is more to the case than meets the eye and eventually identifies the cause of death as bubonic plague, which brings Tony DiNozzo to town, having had a brush with the disease himself. He and Pride go aboard the dead man's ship to try to pinpoint the source of the disease and halt its spread. Crime drama, starring Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates when an armoured vehicle transporting detainees to a naval jail crashes and several prisoners escape, including a black-market dealer travelling under a false name who is one of the country's biggest national security threats. As the enquiry throws up some surprising facts, Pride has to pull some strings higher up the chain of command in his search for answers and has a clandestine meeting with Gibbs in the middle of the ocean.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A bomb detonates at a military charity concert, killing two men. Called to investigate, Tony and McGee try to determine whether the intended target was the 1980s rocker headlining the act or if the attack was part of a larger scheme against the military. Meanwhile, Jimmy prepares for parenthood. Keith Carradine guest stars, with Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Part two of two. The forensic experts are forced to co-operate with serial killer Nate Haskell to get information on the identity of Dr Jekyll, and his cryptic clues lead them to a restaurant frequented by each of the victims. Meanwhile, Langston receives a package that indicates a terrifying fate for the psychopath's next target. Crime drama, starring Laurence Fishburne and Bill Irwin.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac returns from holiday in London and his first case sends the CSIs to the Statue of Liberty. A security guard has had her throat cut, but some of the blood at the scene is not hers, and the team's efforts are hampered by the security cameras having been turned off at the time of the killing. With Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes and Carmine Giovinazzo.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Rollins comes home to find her sister in her apartment, and the SVU squad does all it can to keep her safe from an unexpected visitor. Hard-hitting and emotional series chronicling the life and crimes of the New York Police Department, starring Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives make their way to a recording studio after receiving a domestic abuse call from prominent R'n'B singer Mischa, who claims she was attacked by her rapper boyfriend. Armed with information as to his likely whereabouts, Amaro and Fin head off to confront him.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The trial of pimp Bart Ganzel begins. Meanwhile, Detective Cassidy is accused of raping a woman while undercover, resulting in a court appearance of his own. Hard-hitting and emotional series chronicling the life and crimes of the New York Police Department, starring Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A sports reporter seeks Benson's help to accuse a cameraman of rape, but only agrees to press charges after she discovers the man is stalking her. Before the trial begins the team finds out she is pregnant, and ADA Barba must contend with questionable defence tactics as a result.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU detectives investigate after a school nurse notices multiple injuries on a young girl. It soon becomes clear that they must stop a clinically psychopathic boy with homicidal tendencies. Hard-hitting and emotional series chronicling the life and crimes of the New York Police Department, starring Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.(n)

programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Locked Box.
programme.desc: The homicide detective investigates the murder of Zac Romero, the reclusive 22-year-old billionaire founder of the nanotech company Folkalize. There are an unusually high number of lacerations on the body and the killer appears to have been the invisible man. Comedy drama, starring Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a Middle Eastern man sends Briscoe and Curtis racing to thwart a suspected terrorist plot to bring destruction to New York - and leads them to uncover a domestic conspiracy involving horrific female circumcision. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A charity worker with a secret appetite for sordid encounters dies at the hands of a serial killer, but the defendant constructs a unique case by claiming the crime was the result of exposure to excessive violence on television. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Carey Lowell.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team investigate the case of a Hollywood star whose body has been found in the boot of a car on a film set. The celebrity rehab centre where he had been staying becomes the focus of their inquiries, especially once they discover the victim was about to expose a number of damaging secrets. Starring David Caruso.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: CIA agent Trent Kort returns to track down dangerous criminal Jonathan Siravo and Gibbs is forced to put his personal feelings aside to assist in the investigation. The duo manage to get hold of Siravo's accountant, who agrees to reveal all he knows in exchange for full immunity, but the trail leads to an old man in a coma in what seems to be a case of stolen identity.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue
programme.desc: Detective Donovan Boyd gives Dov, Andy and Traci a secret undercover training exercise, but the mission is jeopardised when they find a woman who has overdosed on drugs and proves difficult to handle.(n)

programme.title: The Mysteries of Laura
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Ghost in the Machine.
programme.desc: Undercover detective John Campbell is shot dead while investigating an illegal international trade in stolen luxury car parts. Laura and the team quickly make an arrest, only to find a photograph of Campbell in the suspected killer's possession that could only have been obtained from an apparently secure police computer. It transpires that other police files have also been hacked and circulated to the wider world, so the team sets out to find the hacker responsible. Debra Messing stars.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the double murder of a wealthy man and his daughter, and the evidence leads them to suspect the wife and stepmother of the deceased are guilty.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A girl is killed in a crime displaying all the hallmarks of white supremacists who recruit teenagers to carry out acts of violence, and the team races to bring the ringleader to justice before more youngsters are butchered. Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The teenage daughter of a notorious drug baron is found dead in a back street. Evidence suggests she had recently visited a local night club, causing Greg and Riley to suspect the involvement of its owner. However, evidence from the post-mortem forces the team to question the girl's involvement with one of her father's underlings.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is forced to work alongside the FBI to catch the killer of an Immigration and Customs Enforcement agent who was murdered during a poker game at the Secretary of the Navy's mansion. Elsewhere, Tony takes on Rivkin in a confrontation that ends in one of them being shot. Guest starring Hustle's Jaime Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team flies to Israel, but receives a hostile reception from Ziva's father, who is the head of intelligence agency Mossad. As events unfold, Gibbs learns that Ziva was romantically involved with Rivkin and finds himself forced to make a tough decision. Guest starring Michael Nouri, alongside Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Cote de Pablo.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. Gibbs joins forces with the FBI when the body of a congressman and former agent washes ashore in New Orleans. Together they try to determine if the murder could be linked to a well-known case the victim had previously worked on during his career. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.desc: A local college student is sexually assaulted, and the SVU detectives utilise every strategy they have to uncover a massive conspiracy involving the university's leading administrators. programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Based on a story by Stephen King, The Shawshank Redemption is the directorial debut of screenwriter Frank Darabont. In 1946, a banker named Andy Dufresne is convicted of a double murder, even though he stubbornly proclaims his innocence. He's sentenced to a life term at the Shawshank State Prison in Maine, where another lifer, Ellis "Red" Redding, picks him as the new recruit most likely to crack under the pressure. The ugly realities of prison life are quickly introduced to Andy: a corrupt warden,sadistic guards led by Capt. Byron Hadley, and inmates who are little better than animals, willing to use rape or beatings to insure their dominance. But Andy does not crack: he has the hope of the truly innocent, which allow him to prevail behind bars. He uses his banking skills to win favor with the warden and the guards, doing the books for Norton's illegal business schemes and keeping an eye on the investments of most of the prison staff. In exchange, he is able to improve the prison library and bring some dignity and respect back to many of the inmates, including Red. Starring Morgan Freeman, Tim Robbins, Bob Gunton(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: John Travolta and Denzel Washington star in Tony Scott's remake of the 1974 thriller. It's a day the passengers on a New York subway train are unlikely to forget. And it's one that could rescue the professional life of subway employee Walter Garber, whose glittering career has been derailed by allegations of corruption. Garber is languishing on duty as a train dispatcher when all hell breaks loose after one of the Lexington Avenue line trains is hijacked by a gang led by the supremely self-assured, dispassionately ruthless Ryder. Ryder issues a demand for $10m and makes it clear that he won't hesitate to kill anyone who gets in his way. Garber and NYPD hostage negotiator Lieutenant Camonetti attempt to get to grips with the crisis but, as events progress, suspicions arise as to whether there's more to the hijacking than first meets the eye. Also starring James Gandolfini as New York's mayor and Luis Guzmán as a disgruntled subway worker who has joined Ryder's gang(n)

When the crew arrive, Ann is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape. But instead of devouring her, the ape becomes smitten with her. His tenderness towards her allows the film crew to capture him, and ambitious director Carl Denham senses a business opportunity(n)

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Storm-chasing scientists Bill Paxton and Helen Hunt face Mother Nature at her worst as tornadoes rip across America. An action adventure to blow your socks off(n)

programme.title: Better Call Saul
programme.desc: Sunk Costs. Jimmy decides to represent a new client, much to Kim's dismay. Meanwhile, Mike meets a formidable ally who presents an enticing offer(n)

programme.title: Better Call Saul
programme.desc: Sabrosito. Jimmy calls in a favor from Mike. Meanwhile, new complications disrupt the Salamancas' business; and Chuck and Jimmy struggle to compromise(n)

programme.title: Better Call Saul
programme.desc: Sabrosito. Jimmy calls in a favor from Mike. Meanwhile, new complications disrupt the Salamancas' business; and Chuck and Jimmy struggle to compromise(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper based on the classic Rat Pack film. When thief Danny Ocean is released from prison, he rounds up his old team of top criminals for a complicated heist in which they will rob three Las Vegas casinos at the same time. The casinos are owned by ruthless hotelier Terry Benedict, who is now dating Danny's ex-wife - and who is not so keen to part with his cash(n)

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: Dalton is a true gentleman with a degree in philosophy from NYU. He also has a flip side - he's the best bar bouncer in the business. When Dalton's brought in to clean up a popular establishment that become particularly rowdy, his calm is put to the test by the town bully, in this throwback to the great westerns of the 40's and 50's(n)

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone stars as a cop named Marion Cobretti -- Cobra for short -- in this action-thriller whose mile-a-minute pacing, dash of humor, and impressive stunts will entertain the most demanding fans. His partner is Gonzales (Reni Santoni) and both work for a special unit that is called in when ordinary methods fail. Cobra and Gonzales are assigned to track down a serial killer and at the same time protect Ingrid (Brigitte Nielsen), who seems a likely bet to become victim number 17. The action heats up when they discover that the "one" serial killer is really a whole gang of neo-Nazi locos(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: A gripping drama based on the true story of the mission to rescue 33 miners who were trapped in a underground mine for 69 days(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: A mysterious wanderer looks for dry land after Earth is engulfed by water(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Johnny Depp stars in Roman Polanski's eerie thriller about a rare-book buyer who dabbles in the supernatural when he is asked by a millionaire (Frank Langella) to find a rare volume that enables the reader to contact the Devil. Lena Olin, Emmanuelle Seigner, Barbara Jefford, Jack Taylor(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: In the nerve-shredding third installment of this horror series about a night when all crime is legal, an ex-cop who refused to murder his son's killer must now act as the head of security for a presidential candidate who wants to end "the Purge."(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Husband-and-wife paranormal investigators Ed (Patrick Wilson) and Lorraine Warren (Vera Farmiga) help a single mother living in 1977 London, who claims that she and her children are being terrorized by supernatural forces. Frances O'Connor, Franka Potente, and Simon McBurney co-star. This horror sequel was penned by sibling screenwriting duo Chad and Carey Hayes, and directed by James Wan(n)

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his daughter and estranged wife as a series of massive earthquakes devastate California. Meanwhile, a Cal Tech professor attempts to warn other citizens(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: In Joel Schumacher's taut thriller, told in real time, cynical, smarmy PR man Stu Shepard picks up a ringing phone in a booth in a busy New York street to find a killer on the line. Armed with a high-powered sniper's rifle, the anonymous caller soon proves his prowess and presents Shepard with a choice: convince the police of his story before they shoot him or drop the phone and be shot. His only hope lies in self-abasement and facing up to the truths of his life(n)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: David Fincher's follow-up to Fight Club is a claustrophobic thriller starring Jodie Foster and Kristen Stewart as a mother and daughter trapped in their new house's safe room by a gang of thieves. The housebreakers are a dynamic trio desperate to get their hands on millions of dollars' worth of bonds the previous owner left behind, and their arrival prompts divorcee Meg and 11-year-old Sarah to take refuge in the vault-like room of the title. Unfortunately for them, that's where the loot is concealed, and Fincher ramps up the tension with some exhilarating camera work as a deadly stand-off ensues(n)

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror about a half-human, half-alien female mutant who escapes from a government laboratory and attempts to prolong the life of her species by mating with a human. Pursued by scientists and police, she passes through a chrysalid stage and takes on the appearance of a beautiful young woman. But she can also metamorphose from her eye-catching form into a repulsive, death-dealing monster(n)

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: High-school students restage a play that ended in horrific tragedy in order to honour the 20th anniversary of the event. However, they soon realise that their plan is a deadly mistake(n)

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: The second action thriller in the Dirty Harry series sees maverick cop Harry Callahan investigating the slaying of some of the West Coast's most powerful criminals. Dismissing the theory that the murders are the result of underworld squabbling, Callahan learns that each of the victims was killed by a slug from a .357 Magnum - the most powerful handgun in the world, and a weapon widely used within the San Francisco Police Department(n)

programme.title: Black Card
programme.desc: A missing identification card forces a couple to take a closer look at their culture, identity and place in society. A finalist in the Short Film Competition at the 2015 American Black Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Children
programme.desc: A radioactive cloud turns five children into zombies with black fingernails who scorch everyone they touch(n)

programme.title: Mirrors
programme.desc: Ex-cop Ben Carson takes a job guarding an old psychiatric hospital but soon falls foul of the evil spirits that lurk in the facility's many mirrors(n)

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: A Puerto-Rican ex-con, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of NYC(n)

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: Problem fixer Michael Clayton is brought in to clean up the mess after one of his law firm's top litigators suffers a breakdown while representing a corrupt chemical corporation in a multi-billion dollar legal suit. Under pressure to appease the firm's clients, but having discovered the seriousness of the corporation's iniquities, Clayton finds himself torn between his desire to do the right thing and a pressing need to pay off spiralling personal debts.Dir: Tony Gilroy(n)

programme.title: Never Die Alone
programme.desc: From a script from first-time scribe James Gibson comes this filmed adaptation of ex-gangster Donald Goines' 1974 novel Never Die Alone. Directed by Ernest R. Dickerson (Juice, Bones), the films stars David Arquette as Paul Pawlowski, a reporter who takes an interest in gang kingpin King David, played by rapper/actor DMX. When King David is killed, Pawlowski happens upon the criminal's journal and envelops himself in his story. From there, the rise and fall of King David is covered in flashbacks as Pawlowski makes his way through the diary. Aisha Tyler and Jennifer Sky co-star(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Student Peter Parker develops superhuman strength after he's bitten by a laboratory spider. He starts to hit back against the school bullies, and then takes the fight against crime into the city. Action(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the live action adaptation of the Marvel comic strip about an alienated teen who is bitten by a genetically altered spider and subsequently develops superhuman powers. Dr Otto Octavius takes on the guise of Dr Octopus to try and defeat the superhero(n)

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A scientist survives a mankind-destroying virus and struggles to live in a New York City overflowing with cannibalistic zombies that come out only at night. A jarring apocalyptic pulse-pounder based on the 1954 sci-fi classic novel by Richard Matheson(n)

programme.title: Body of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: Reteaming the director and star of Gangs of New York, Martin Scorcese's The Aviator stars Leonardo DiCaprio as legendary millionaire Howard Hughes. Focusing on the early part of Hughes' adult life, the film chronicles how he built his fortune, beginning as the proprietor of his late father's tool company, then as a Hollywood producer and the owner of RKO studios, and later as an aviation mogul. Alan Alda, Alec Baldwin, and Kate Beckinsale also star(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: CIA agent Jack Ryan races to avert war between Russia and the US after a terrorist threatens to detonate a nuclear bomb(n)

programme.title: World War II in Color
programme.desc: Britain at Bay. Britain's near-defeat at the hands of Germany. Included: mistakes made by Luftwaffe commander Hermann Goering that enabled Britain to regroup; Britain's reliance on codebreakers and trained spies(n)

programme.title: World War II in Color
programme.desc: Hitler Strikes East. The fourth episode explores Hitler's assault on the Soviet Union in the summer of 1941, Operation Barbarossa and his attack on the Caucasus in 1942. (Followed by News)(n)

programme.title: World War II in Color
programme.desc: Red Sun Rampant. The attack on Pearl Harbour brought the 'sleeping giant', America, into the war, and saw the emergence of the aircraft carrier as the pre-eminent weapon of the seas(n)

programme.title: World War II in Color
programme.desc: The Mediterranean and North Africa. Documentary series. This episode looks at Mussolini's push into North Africa and the air and sea battles fought for the control of Malta(n)

programme.desc: D-Day. The 1944 Normandy Invasion is recounted in the opener of this series, which follows World War II from D-Day to VJ Day(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.desc: The Battle for Caen. Allied forces move toward the city of Caen, but are halted by Panzer forces(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.desc: Breakout of Normandy. A German counterattack in Normandy attempts to divide the Allies, but British and Canadian forces hit hard in the north and American forces attack in the south to create the "Falaise Pocket."(n)

programme.sub-title: Battle for the Scheldt and Arnhem
programme.desc: Battle for the Scheldt and Arnhem. The Battle of the Scheldt is a victory for the Canadian 1st Army and opens the port of Antwerp for Allied supplies; while British forces fail in their attempt to break German defenses at Arnhem(n)

programme.desc: Fighting Fox: Road to Hell. Season 2 begins with World War II paratroopers in Fox Company, 2nd Battalion of the 506th Parachute Infantry Regiment, who fought from D-Day on June 6, 1944, to Berchtesgaden in the Bavarian Alps at the end of the war in Europe(n)

programme.sub-title: The Untold Story of the Rescue at Dogshead
programme.desc: The Untold Story of the Rescue at Dogshead. U.S. soldiers are trapped after stumbling into a complex of North Vietnamese bunkers in March 1970, and their only hope for survival is an exhausted armored calvary unit several miles away(n)

programme.desc: The Untold Story of the Battle of Mortain. An armored German attack in northwestern France in August 1944 is repelled by an Army National Guard unit, even though they are outgunned, outnumbered and partially surrounded(n)

programme.desc: A look at memorable conflicts involving the U.S. military, including the Battle of Surigao Strait in the Pacific in 1944, the Battle of Ia Drang in South Vietnam in 1965 and the Battle of Tal Afar in Iraq in 2005(n)

programme.desc: Tojo: Japan's Razor of Fear. A profile of Hideki Tojo (1884-1948), a Japanese general and prime minister during World War II who was sentenced to death and executed in 1948 for committing war crimes(n)

programme.desc: Off Roadin'. Two teams of wardens chase people on all-terrain vehicles; a rookie warden responds to a report of a dead deer hanging by a chain and missing a leg deep in the woods(n)

programme.title: North Woods Law

programme.desc: Takedown. In the Season 5 premiere, the arrival of big-game season in Maine means an influx of sportsmen who don't always follow the rules, so the wardens are on the lookout for poachers and night hunters(n)
